page.title: 0103800210:GENERAL DESCRIPTION
page.content: The whole block is mainly{farmland} which is pasture. There are many farms. Nearly all are self-supporting and families are engaged in work on the farm. Some farms have cows and sheep, others may just have one kind of animal. The farms vary in size. Only a few appear to have labourers' cottages. Some cottages are thatched; some are named after farms or brooks, eg 'Daniel's Brook Cottages'. Houses are being built in the NW corner of the block. In{Harescombe}the newest is about 15 years old. There is some public transport. The{M5}runs diagonally through the block as does the{railway.}There are no shops at all. There are 3 churches, including the very ancient {Harescombe Church.}
